title: Waterpik Cordless Water Flosser, Battery Operated & Portable for Travel & Home, ADA Accepted Cordless Express, White WF-02
description:
WATER FLOSS ON THE GO
The Waterpik Cordless Express WF-02 is a great solution when you want the convenience of water flossing in the shower or on the go. It combines water pressure with pulsating action for an exceptional cleaning, removing harmful bacteria and debris that traditional brushing and flossing can't reach.

NO CHARGING CORDS, WATERPROOF DESIGN
3 AA battery operated, portable, and waterproof, the Waterpik Cordless Express water Flosser is designed for travel anywhere, use in the shower, and smaller bathrooms.

CLINICALLY PROVEN
Removes up to 99.9% of plaque
Up to 50% more effective than string floss for improving gum health
Accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA)

FEATURES & IN THE BOX
3 AA batteries
Easy-to-fill, removable 5-ounce water reservoir
2 JT-450E water flossing tips
2 pressure settings ranging from 45 to 75 PSI
1200 water pulses per minute
Measures 2.5w x 3.6d x 11.75h (inches with tip)
The Waterpik support team based in Fort Collins, Colorado is available to help with any product questions or needs.
Cordless Express is backed by a 1-year manufacturer..
